Photo by Geoff Forester

   By Allie Morris April 29, 2016

Maggie Hassan says Kelly Ayotte has record of voting to defund Planned
Parenthood

   Republican U.S. Sen. Kelly Ayotte faces a competitive reelection bid in
   New Hampshire and Democrats are already taking aim at her record on
   abortion and women’s health.

Ayotte, elected to the U.S. Senate in 2010, has been a consistent opponent
   of abortion and critic of Planned Parenthood.

true true
